name: J&J Snack Foods Corp.
description: J&J Snack Foods Corp. is a leading manufacturer and distributor of snack foods and beverages in the United States. Founded in 1971 and headquartered in Pennsauken, New Jersey, the company specializes in a wide variety of snack products, including soft pretzels, churros, and frozen beverages. J&J Snack Foods operates a diverse portfolio of brands, catering to both retail and food service markets. Their products can be found in convenience stores, supermarkets, and various food service locations such as restaurants and amusement parks. The company is committed to quality and innovation, continuously expanding its offerings to meet changing consumer preferences. J&J Snack Foods emphasizes the importance of health and wellness in its product development, introducing options that appeal to health-conscious consumers. With a solid track record of growth and a focus on strategic acquisitions, J&J Snack Foods aims to enhance its market position and deliver value to its shareholders. The company’s mission is to provide delicious and convenient snack foods that consumers can enjoy anytime, anywhere.

seo.meta_title: J&J Snack Foods Corp. | Snack Foods and Beverages
seo.meta_description: Explore J&J Snack Foods Corp., a leader in the snack food industry, providing a wide range of delicious and convenient products. Learn about our brands and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What does J&J Snack Foods manufacture?
faq.answer: J&J Snack Foods manufactures a variety of snack foods, including soft pretzels and churros, as well as frozen beverages.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of J&J Snack Foods?
faq.answer: Gerald B. Shreiber is the CEO of J&J Snack Foods Corp.

faq.question: Where is J&J Snack Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: J&J Snack Foods is headquartered in Pennsauken, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What are the main product categories of J&J Snack Foods?
faq.answer: Main product categories include Frozen Snacks and Baked Goods.

faq.question: When was J&J Snack Foods founded?
faq.answer: J&J Snack Foods was founded in 1971.
